target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: The audit reported 0 findings and marked the contract as safe, completely missing the critical access_control vulnerability in createLockedCampaign() where an arbitrary external call is made to a user-provided tokenLocker address.

notes: The audit completely failed to identify the critical vulnerability. The createLockedCampaign() function at line 52-78 makes an arbitrary external call to donation.tokenLocker (line 64-74) with user-controlled parameters. This is the exact Hedgey Finance exploit pattern where attackers provided malicious tokenLocker addresses to steal tokens from approved users. The contract should not trust arbitrary tokenLocker addresses or should use a whitelist of verified lockers.
